text: Paul Lannoye (22 June 1939 – 4 December 2021) was a Belgian politician. He was a co-founder of the Ecolo party. He was a member of the European Parliament from 1989 to 2004. Lannoye died on 4 December 2021, at the age of 82.Paul Lannoye, membre fondateur du mouvement écologiste en Belgique, est décédé à l’âge de 82 ans ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:MEPs for Belgium
title: Paul Lannoye
